title: varundi varundiyEnum (padam)
sahitya:
varundi varundiyEnum azhaittu vA sakhiyE maNivaNNanaik-kaNNanai vArttai maranda mannanai


anupallavi

  marandAnO anri varattAn manamillaiyO manadu mighavum nondEn mAdhavaniDam shenru nI


caraNam    anrandip-pOdinil ambjAkSan iLam tenral ulAvum tEmalar shOlaiyil
 konjiyum kenjiyum kulaviya gOvindan kOpamuTrAnO kAraNam arigilEn
